name: Small
description: A blogging application aimed at providing a minimal, fast, and easy-to-use interface for expressing your ideas to the world.

SITE_ID.description: Hostname of your WordPress.com blog, e.g. "andrewmduthie.wordpress.com"

AUTHOR_EMAIL.description: Optional email address associated with your Gravatar profile, used to retrieve connected services and Gravatar image.

ACCOUNTS.description: Optional comma-separated set of Gravatar connected services to use. Specify custom services using the syntax "service:url", e.g. "github:https://github.com/aduth". A service must be supported by the FontAwesome web font to be displayed correctly.

GA_ACCOUNT_ID.description: Optional Google Analytics account ID for tracking page views. Page views are automatically tracked using WordPress.com stats.
